snippet: A day after Robert Serra, a rising star in Venezuela’s governing party, was stabbed to death in his home, officials said Thursday that it was a carefully planned murder.
abstract: Venezuelan police say stabbing death of Robert Serra, rising star in country's governing party, in his home was carefully planned murder.
lead_paragraph: A day after Robert Serra, a rising star in Venezuela’s governing party, was stabbed to death in his home, officials said Thursday that it was a carefully planned murder.

headline.main: Venezuela: Lawmaker Killed in His Home, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Venezuela: Lawmaker Killed in His Home, Police Say
